sqoop.arg: SELECT _SP_PalletLabelID,PalletID,MachineStage,PartNumber,InvState,PalletNo,CreatedDT,CompleteDT,Quantity,LabelTemplate,PrinterURL,PrintedDT,ScannedDT,IsCancelled,IsReprint,PartDescription,LabelSaveDirectory,IsPrintLandscape,NoCopies,LabelsPerInventoryPack, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_PalletLabel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStageID,AcquisitionVariantID,LastMeasurementSetID,AcquisitionContextID,LastDoneDT,IsAttrOC,IsCriticalDefect, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionContext WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ActionID,RfSpecialActionTypeID,ActionTypeID,ActionSubTypeID,ActionPlanID,ActionPlanCode,ActionName,Description,ActionOrder,RfPriorityID,SubmitterID,SubmittedDT,OwnerID,ActionStatusID,ClosedDT,ModifiedDT,LoginID,IsEdited,RevisionNo,DueDT,DeadlineDT,ExpiryDT,SortOrder, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Action WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AddressID,Address1,Address2,City,County,PostCode,Country, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Address WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AttributeID,AttributeTypeID,ProductID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Attribute WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT BOMItemID,BOMVariantID,PartID,SubPartID,SubPartQuantity,SubPartUnitID,RfInvPackTraceabilityID,Sequence,Instructions,RfBOMItemTypeID,IsDefault,IsAllowExceedBOMQty,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.BOMItem WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ConcernID,ConcernStatusID,ConcernTypeID,RaisedDT,ClosedDT,SeverityID,DueDate,ConcernOwnerID,DepartmentOwnerID,CustomerID,CustomerContact,CustomerReference,AffectOnCustomer,PartTypeID,PartID,WOID,LineID,ProductionFromDT,ShiftID,QuantityAffected,QuantityUsed,InvIsolatedReasonID,Cost,LoginID,ModifiedDT,Concern,SubmitterLoginID,CustomerProduct,RfCurrencyID,MachineStageID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,RfConcernApplicationTypeID,HeadNo,ProductionToDT,QuantityFound,QuantityReturned,QuantityScrapped,QuantitySorted,SupplierID,ToolID,VariableTypeID,AttributeTypeID,ClosedByLoginID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Concern WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CustomerID,Customer,CustomerCode,AddressID,RfLanguageID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Customer WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT id,objectid,property,value,uvalue,lvalue,version, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.dtproperties WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT GaugeTypeID,GaugeType, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.GaugeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT InvStateID,InvState,Description,RfInvStateID,InvStateCode,IsAddToProduction,IsAddToHFI,IsDefault, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InvState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineSectionID,LineSection,Description,IsRetired, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineSection WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LKConcernActionID,ConcernID,ActionID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkConcernAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentAssetID,DocumentID,AssetID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentAsset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkInvPackInvPackID,InventoryPackFromID,InventoryPackToID,RfInventoryLinkTypeID,LoginID,ModifiedDT, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkInvPackInvPack WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageID,MachineGroupID,LkMGMSID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMGMS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkPartDocumentID,PartID,DocumentID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkPartDocument WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCCalcStyleID,RfViolationRuleID,RfChartComponentID,LkSPCCSVRID,RuleRange,RuleGroup, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkSPCCSVR WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkUCTGUCTID,UnitCountTypeGroupID,UnitCountTypeID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkUCTGUCT WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStageCellID,MachineStageID,IsCreator,IsConsumer,IsLabeller,IsAutoBatchNo,IsPackConsumer,IsResortConsumer,IsNonJob,IsToolShowCavities,IsInvPackPackNo,IsInvPackPartNo,IsInvPackPartDesc,IsInvPackPartType,IsInvPackQty,IsInvPackHeader,IsInvPackRows,IsInvPackState,IsInvPackReason,IsAcqDblck,AcqGrid,CustomPage,IsClickable,IsDrillable, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageCell WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStopReasonID,StopReason,Description,MachineStageTypeID,IsPlanned,StopCode,RfMachineStopClassID,RfLineStopReasonTypeID,MachineStopCategoryID,IsRetired, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStopReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureID,MaintenanceProcedure,PartID,ResponsibleDepartmentID,BudgetWorkDone,PlannedManHours,PlannedDuration,MaintenanceProcedureCode,AdvanceWarningPeriod,SchedulingWindow,PlannedMachineStageDowntime,PlannedLineDowntime,SubPartID,CreatedDT,CreatedLoginID,RfMaintenanceWorkTypeID,CostCentreID,IsAutoAuthoriseWork,IsRetired,IsToolTakenOutOfService, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedure WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceWorkID,MaintenanceWO,AssetID,MaintenanceProcedureID,MaintenanceProcedureRevisionID,MaintProcScheduleOnAssetID,RfMaintenanceWorkTypeID,AdhocWorkToDo,MaintProcScheduleOnAssetNo,MaintenanceWorkStatusID,ActualStartDT,ActualEndDT,ActualManHours,PlannedStartDT,PlannedEndDT,PlannedManHours,OwnerLoginID,ActualLabourCost,PlannedLabourCost,RfCurrencyID,PartsCost,LineDownCost,Priority,MaintenanceReasonID,IsPlannedDateLockedByUser,EBATriggerID,PeriodDueDT,RunHoursDueDT,PartsBasedDueDT,EventDueDT,ReleasedDT,ReleasedLoginID,IsEdited,RevisionNo,AbsoluteCounterThreshold, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceWork WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MeasurementSetPID,ActualAttrSampleSize,AcquisitionContextID,IsEdited,DT,AcquisitionID,MachineStageID,RfAcquisitionClassID,RevisionNo,PartID,JobID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSetP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCCounterID,OPCItemID,Description,LoValue,HiValue,Scale,Offset,Formula,UnitCountTypeID,ScrapReasonID,ModifiedDT,LoginID,IsProduction,AcceptableRateOfChange,RfDeltaValueModeID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCCounter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCMachineEventCodeID,OPCMachineEventCode,OPCMachineEventID,MachineStopReasonID,IsRunning, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCMachineEventCode WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OperationTypeID,OperationType,OperationTypeCode,Description,PartTypeID,Sequence,IsOptional, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OperationType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ProductID,ProductTypeID,Name,Description,IsRetired,PartID,Variant1,Variant2,Variant3,Variant4,Variant5,Variant6,Variant7,Variant8,Variant9,Variant10,Variant11,Variant12,Variant13,Variant14,Variant15,Variant16,Variant17,Variant18,Variant19,Variant20, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Product WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT RootCauseTypeID,RootCauseType,Description,RootCauseTypeCode, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.RootCauseType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SettingsPlantNameTemplatesID,CreateInvPackNoTemplate,CustomerUniqueKeyTemplate,InventoryPackNameTemplate,WONumberTemplate,ReceiveInvPackNoTemplate,BOMVariantTemplate, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SettingsPlantNameTemplates WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftTypeID,Name,Description,IsNonWorking, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartSetViewID,SPCChartSetView,Sequence,SPCChartSetID,RfChartSetViewTypeID,NoCols,NoRows,Caption,Tooltip,IsAggregated,RfCutByIDs,IsPanelled,ImageURI,GridImageRender,ParetoXAxis,ParetoStackBy,SPCChartSetViewStyleID,IsAutoFit,OverlayFlags, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartSetView WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCVarChartID,SPCRuleID,ProductID,AcquisitionID,MachineStageID,VariableTypeID,RfAttributeClassID,HeadNo,RfAcquisitionClassID,TrendStartMSID,TAGMSTYPE1ID,ATTRIBUTETYPEID,TAGMSVALUE1,CreateDT,LoginID,IsMsetInsert, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCVarChart WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagListValueID,TagListID,TagListValue,DisplayOrder,IsRetired, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagListValue WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagTreeNodeImgLocID,TagTreeNodeID,X,Y,Width,Height,MappedTagTreeNodeID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTreeNodeImgLoc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolID,Tool,ToolSet,Description,ToolTypeID,IsRetired,NoCavities,Variant1,Variant2,Variant3,Variant4,Variant5,Variant6,Variant7,Variant8,Variant9,Variant10,Variant11,Variant12,Variant13,Variant14,Variant15,PartID,Variant16,Variant17,Variant18,Variant19,Variant20, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Tool WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolChangeReasonID,ToolTypeID,ChangeReason,Description,ChangeToRfToolStatusID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolChangeReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT UnitID,Unit,Description, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Unit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VarChartOCID,MeasurementSetID,SPCChartControlLimitID,SubgroupID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VarChartOC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT VarMeasurementPID,SpecID,MeasurementSetPID,Measurement,Ignored,VariableTypeID,ProductID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,DT,RfIsOSID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VarMeasurementP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT WorkInstructionResultID,WorkInstructionStepID,OperationID,DT,Comments,LoginID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WorkInstructionResult WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStop.MachineStopID, MachineStop.MachineStopReasonID, MachineStop.FromDT, MachineStop.ToDT, MachineStop.MachineStageID, MachineStop.IsEdited, MachineStop.RevisionNo, MachineStop_.StopComments, MachineStop_.StartComments, MachineStop_.StartLoginID, MachineStop_.StopLoginID, MachineStop_.OpenedStopDT, MachineStop_.SavedStopDT, MachineStop_.OpenedStartDT, MachineStop_.SavedStartDT, MachineStop_.OriginalLoginID, MachineStop_.EditedMachineStopID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM MachineStop FULL JOIN MachineStop_ ON (MachineStop.MachineStopID = MachineStop_.MachineStopID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
